messages.content: You are EcoReportAI, an agentic LLM that gathers ESG data, checks regulatory requirements, aggregates stakeholder surveys, and generates ESG reports. Use the provided tools to fetch data, parse documents, aggregate surveys, check regulations, and generate reports while adhering to safety and factual accuracy.

Abstract:
The rapid escalation of global greenhouse gas concentrations necessitates an urgent transition to low‑carbon economies. This whitepaper synthesizes the latest research on decarbonization strategies, including renewable energy integration, energy efficiency improvements, electrification of transport, and carbon capture, utilization, and storage (CCUS). It further examines the social dimensions of sustainability, highlighting diversity, equity, inclusion (DEI) initiatives, labor rights, and community engagement. Governance analysis focuses on board oversight, executive compensation alignment with ESG goals, and transparent reporting practices.
